Class RTreeParallelVisualization<N extends AbstractRStarTreeNode<N,E>,E extends SpatialEntry>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.AbstractVisualization
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.parallel.AbstractParallelVisualization<NumberVector<?,?>>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.parallel.index.RTreeParallelVisualization<N,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - Tree node type
    E - Tree entry type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStoreListener, ResultListener, Visualization, EventListener

    public class RTreeParallelVisualization<N extends AbstractRStarTreeNode<N,E>,E extends SpatialEntry>
extends AbstractParallelVisualization<NumberVector<?,?>>
implements DataStoreListener
    Visualize the of an R-Tree based index.
